Articles.Content: Does anyone know how to set up the air intake, I have never done this before.

Only thing it needs is a +Y (green arrow) transform pointed in the direction of travel (basically, the edge you want pointed into the wind to generate air)

Then make that transform name match in the config (mine was just named Intake) and set up the other modules, which you can lift from a stock config.

intakeTransformName = Intake

Pretty much like a basic engine.
